actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Disability Assistance and Memorial Affairs.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Disability Assistance and Memorial Affairs

official_title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to clarify presumptions relating to the exposure of certain veterans who served in the vicinity of the Republic of Vietnam, and for other purposes.
short_title: Blue Water Navy Vietnam Veterans Act of 2013

summary.text: Blue Water Navy Vietnam Veterans Act of 2013 - Includes as part of the Republic of Vietnam its territorial seas for purposes of the presumption of service connection for diseases associated with exposure by veterans to certain herbicide agents while in Vietnam.

titles.title: Blue Water Navy Vietnam Veterans Act of 2013
To amend title 38, United States Code, to clarify presumptions relating to the exposure of certain veterans who served in the vicinity of the Republic of Vietnam, and for other purposes.
Blue Water Navy Vietnam Veterans Act of 2013
